headline: Bloom Energy’s AI Data Center Deals Spark Rethink On Valuation And Growth
summary: Bloom Energy (NYSE:BE) announced a $2.65b, 20 year agreement with a subsidiary of American Electric Power to supply long term power solutions. The company is also exploring a potential $5b partnership with Brookfield Asset Management focused on energy infrastructure for AI data centers. These moves position Bloom Energy as a key provider of resilient, lower carbon power for data center operators.
